faq1.question: How does Daart Ads use AI for advertising?
faq1.answer: Our AI analyzes customer behavior, optimizes bidding strategies, and automatically adjusts campaigns to maximize your ROI across all platforms.

faq2.question: Do I need technical expertise to use Daart Ads?
faq2.answer: No technical skills required! Our platform is designed for businesses of all sizes with intuitive interfaces and automated processes.

faq3.question: What's the minimum budget required?
faq3.answer: Start with any budget that works for your business. Our AI optimizes spending regardless of your budget size.

faq4.question: How quickly can I see results?
faq4.answer: Most clients see improved performance within the first week, with significant results within 30 days of campaign optimization.
